				STATE v. ZUNGALI2015 OK CR 8348 P.3d 704Case Number: S-2014-873Decided: 05/01/2015STATE OF OKLAHOMA, Appellant, v. BRANDON LEE ZUNGALI and DAISHA TYSHELL HARRIS, Appellees.
Cite as: 2015 OK CR 8, 348 P.3d 704

				

 


OPINION

JOHNSON, JUDGE:
¶1 The State of Oklahoma appeals the October 9, 2014 order entered by the 
Honorable Gary E. Miller of the District Court of Canadian County in Case Nos. 
CF-2014-143 and CF-2014-144, sustaining Appellee Zungali's and Harris's Motions 
to Suppress Evidence. The district court's ruling prohibited admission of all 
evidence seized during a search of Appellees' minivan. We exercise jurisdiction 
under 22 O.S.2011, § 1053(5) and 
reverse the district court's ruling.
BACKGROUND
